# ContextTool

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/context_tool_def/ContextTool" symbolName="ContextTool" /> ContextTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

When an LLM uses a tool during a call, a Tool instance is created with the specific
arguments provided by the LLM.


**Alias to:** `mirascope_v2_llm.tools.context_tool.ContextTool`
